Deprecated. as of Spring JDBC Extensions 1.2.0 in favor of directly using the Querydsl Spring support 

@Deprecated
public class UncategorizedQueryException
extends UncategorizedDataAccessException

Exception thrown when we can't classify a Query into one of Spring's data access exceptions.

Author:
Thomas Risberg
